testcase.name: Validating adactin booking module
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Adactin site...............................................passed When User should enter "vvenu1994" and "DRVU6C".............................passed And User in search hotel page enter "Sydney","Hotel Sunshine","Standard","1 - One","16/10/2020","17/10/2020","4 - Four"and "0 - None".passed And User in select hotel page select hotel..................................passed And User in book hotel page enter "venu","s" and "fdghs"....................passed Then User should verify url navigated to booking confirmation page and ordernumber generated.passed
